i-x x x x na x x x x i-tal-ku-u₂-ni {URU}ma-lak il-ti-bi-i a-ki UD-mu im-me-ra-an-ni ina UGU x x URU-MEŠ {LU₂}ra-mu-u₂-ti ur-ta-mi₃-i UN-MEŠ GUD-MEŠ gab-bu ih-tab-tu am-mar u₂-še-zi-bu-u-ni ig-du-ru-u₂-ni ina {URU}de-ri e-tar-bu-u-ni UD 14-KAM {ITI}KAN ša-{LU₂}BAD-HAL-li-a-ti a-na {URU}ma-li-ki a-sap-par i-tal-ku-u-ni iq-ṭe₃-bu-u₂-ni ma-a {LU₂}NIGIR₂ be₂-et {1}NUMUN-AŠ e-tar-ba UN-MEŠ KUR {URU}ma-lak-a.a up-ta-hi-ir ina E₂-DINGIR E₂-DINGIR u₂-se-ri-ib EN.NUN-šu₂-nu i-na-ṣur x x x x x ša {1}NUMUN-AŠ x x x x x u₂-sa-x li x x {LU₂}A-šip-ri-ia {LU₂}A-šip-ri-ia TA@v {URU}x x UD 14-KAM iš-hu-ra-an-ni a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ a-sap-par i-su-ri LUGAL be-li₂ i-qa-bi ma-a LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} a.a-ak-ka {URU}E₂-im-bi-i šu-u₂ {LU₂}e-muq-qi₂ an-nu-ti ša {URU}ma-li-ki il-lik-ni-ni šum-ma a-na {URU}de-ri il-lak-u₂-ni šum₂-ma a-na ku-tal-li i-sa-hu-ru u₂-di-ni ṭe₃-en-šu-nu la i-har-ra-ṣu a-ki-ma a-ki-ma ṭe₃-en-šu-nu ih-ta-ar₂-ṣu be₂-et pa-ni-šu-nu-u₂-ni a-na LUGAL BE-ia₂ a-šap-par {1}NUMUN-AŠ a-du-u₂ x {LU₂}GAL-MEŠ-šu₂ DUMU-MEŠ-šu₂
